entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:45 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 40 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 40 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 56 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
